scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Lesley Moseley
scrape.text:
I read this book, years ago, and thought it absolutely fantastic. The moral dilemmas still resonate as I have a 'wild child' , and KNOW that if I were in a similar position, what I would do.
I too, don't recommend it, as my quirky taste rarely maries with the majority of readers.
